with svc_time as ( select distinct client_id , Regexp_Substr(work_time,'[^,]+', 1,level) work_time From trainer t where work_time Is Not Null and t.work_loc1||' '||t.work_loc2 = '대구 달서구' and substr(sun || mon || tue || wed || thu || fri || sat, to_char(to_date('21-11-17','yy-mm-dd'), 'D'),1 ) = 1 Connect By Regexp_Substr('10,11,12,13,14,15', '[^,]+', 1,level) Is Not Null MINUS select client_id2, Regexp_Substr(svc_bgn_tm,'[^,]+', 1,level) work_time from reser_list where reser_dt = #{reser_dt} Connect By Regexp_Substr(svc_bgn_tm, '[^,]+', 1,level) is not null )
Select distinct c.client_id as client_id2, c.name from svc_time s, client c where work_time = #{work_time} and s.client_id = c.client_id
